about_the_game:
Overview

Creature Hunt Is A point-and-click Matching Game.

Features & Elements

🖱️ Point-and-Click Matching Game: A gameplay style where you find and click on the designated creatures on the screen to make them disappear.
👑 Clear Conditions: Advance to the next wave by selecting and clearing all the designated images. Clear all the waves to complete the game.
👻 Hand-Drawn Creatures and UI: Features 111 unique creatures and a user interface, all hand-drawn.
🛸 5 Types of Helpful Items: Five kinds of items are available to aid in advancing the game.
😀 Three Difficulty Levels + Endless Mode: Enjoyable for beginners to advanced players with three difficulty settings, along with an Endless mode for infinite challenges.
💪 Level-Up System: Catching a lot of creatures allows players to level up.

📺Streaming Policy Summary

Streaming is allowed for both individuals and corporations.
Please include the game name and the URL to the store page in the description section.
No prior authorization is required.

name: Creature Match

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 2.2GHz / 2 core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Creature Hunt Is A point-and-click Matching Game. With 111 unique, hand-drawn creatures, three difficulty levels, and an endless mode, it offers endless fun for all ages. Players can level up by catching numerous creatures, enhancing their gaming experience.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
